subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Boxing
lead_paragraph: Deontay Wilder is the least experienced, the most charismatic and, despite a loss in a heavyweight semifinal Friday afternoon, by far the most successful U.S. boxer.
snippet: Deontay Wilder is the least experienced, the most charismatic and, despite a loss in a heavyweight semifinal Friday afternoon, by far the most successful U.S. boxer.
